name: GoodBehaviorTracker
0:
”Alexa, ask Good Behavior to add a star”
”Alexa, ask Good Behavior to set a goal of ten stars”
”Alexa, ask Good Behavior how many stars the kids have”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: good behavior
des: You can use the Good Behavior tracker to track how many stars your kids have for doing good behavior. We believe in cooperative good behavior. So if there are multiple children in your family, the children earn stars together, not individually. This encourages the children to help each other behave well, rather than being competitive with each other.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
